column6: A leading lawyer in the field of human rights, energy law, corporate law and international arbitration. Former minister and considered 'father of the constitution'
Renowned Entrepreneur and Economics, Nobel Laureate
President of Workers Party of Bangladesh and incumbent Member of Parliament (MP) from Barisal-2 at the 2024 general elections.
Scientist who won 2013 Elsevier Foundation Award for her work on nuclear medicine and ultrasonography
Public Speaker and former Member of Parliament
